game.name: Yuri's Resolve
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Yuri’s Resolve is a single-player factory-building game set in Mars' orbit. Salvage wreckage, mine Phobos, construct manufacturing systems, and forge a path back home. Operate from the immersive cockpit of your ship as Yuri’s Resolve delivers a bold, innovative take on the factory building genre.
